messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the future, was MIL
messages.msgSnippet: ... I also only offer the advice once or twice.  Sometimes it will be a long time later that she looks at it again and decides to try it. Tia No one can make
messages.messageBody:
>
>For me, this is the key for my future. Realizing that I am welcome to talk
>myself blue in the face, and my son and his partner may or MAY NOT follow my
>advice.

I also only offer the advice once or twice. Sometimes it will be a long
time later that she looks at it again and decides to try it.
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the future, was MIL
messages.msgSnippet: ... For me, this is the key for my future.  Realizing that I am welcome to talk myself blue in the face, and my son and his partner may or MAY NOT follow my
messages.messageBody:
> She always listens, and often she follows my
> advice.

For me, this is the key for my future. Realizing that I am welcome to talk
myself blue in the face, and my son and his partner may or MAY NOT follow my
advice.

brenda
